comment:
* Manages NFC API's that are coupled to the life-cycle of an Activity. * *

Uses {@link Application#registerActivityLifecycleCallbacks} to hook * into activity life-cycle events such as onPause() and onResume(). * * @hide

variables.name: mApps
variables.comment: Application(s) that have NFC state. Usually one

methods.name: synchronized NfcActivityState getActivityState(Activity activity)
methods.comment: find or create activity state from mActivities

methods.name: public void enableReaderMode(Activity activity, ReaderCallback callback, int flags, Bundle extras)
public void setReaderMode(Binder token, int flags, Bundle extras)
public void setNdefPushContentUri(Activity activity, Uri[] uris)
public void setNdefPushContentUriCallback(Activity activity, NfcAdapter.CreateBeamUrisCallback callback)
public void setNdefPushMessage(Activity activity, NdefMessage message, int flags)
public void setNdefPushMessageCallback(Activity activity, NfcAdapter.CreateNdefMessageCallback callback, int flags)
public void setOnNdefPushCompleteCallback(Activity activity, NfcAdapter.OnNdefPushCompleteCallback callback)
void requestNfcServiceCallback()
methods.comment:
* Request or unrequest NFC service callbacks.
     * Makes IPC call - do not hold lock.

methods.name: public BeamShareData createBeamShareData(byte peerLlcpVersion)
methods.comment: Callback from NFC service, usually on binder thread

methods.name: public void onNdefPushComplete(byte peerLlcpVersion)
methods.comment: Callback from NFC service, usually on binder thread

methods.name: public void onTagDiscovered(Tag tag) throws RemoteException
public void onActivityCreated(Activity activity, Bundle savedInstanceState)
methods.comment: Callback from Activity life-cycle, on main thread

methods.name: public void onActivityStarted(Activity activity)
methods.comment: Callback from Activity life-cycle, on main thread

methods.name: public void onActivityResumed(Activity activity)
methods.comment: Callback from Activity life-cycle, on main thread

methods.name: public void onActivityPaused(Activity activity)
methods.comment: Callback from Activity life-cycle, on main thread

methods.name: public void onActivityStopped(Activity activity)
methods.comment: Callback from Activity life-cycle, on main thread

methods.name: public void onActivitySaveInstanceState(Activity activity, Bundle outState)
methods.comment: Callback from Activity life-cycle, on main thread

methods.name: public void onActivityDestroyed(Activity activity)
methods.comment: Callback from Activity life-cycle, on main thread

methodNames: public void enableReaderMode(Activity activity, ReaderCallback callback, int flags, Bundle extras)
public void setReaderMode(Binder token, int flags, Bundle extras)
public void setNdefPushContentUri(Activity activity, Uri[] uris)
public void setNdefPushContentUriCallback(Activity activity, NfcAdapter.CreateBeamUrisCallback callback)
public void setNdefPushMessage(Activity activity, NdefMessage message, int flags)
public void setNdefPushMessageCallback(Activity activity, NfcAdapter.CreateNdefMessageCallback callback, int flags)
public void setOnNdefPushCompleteCallback(Activity activity, NfcAdapter.OnNdefPushCompleteCallback callback)
public void onTagDiscovered(Tag tag) throws RemoteException
public void onActivityCreated(Activity activity, Bundle savedInstanceState)
public void onActivitySaveInstanceState(Activity activity, Bundle outState)
